name: Revolver Fruit Machine game.
description:
Revolver Pub Fruit Machine is a 'Just for Fun' fruit machine simulator game with a unique roulette-style game wheel! This game is just like the games you would find in your local arcade , pub or casino - with the added bonus that everything is free to play!

How much virtual cash can you win on this fruit machine game? Match 3 fruits on the winline, or fill the trail ladder by collecting numbers which are super-imposed on the winline.

Reach position 4 on the trail ladder and get a bonus to help you along the way.

Once on the feature bonus game, you have to correctly guess if the next number to spin on the wheel will be higher or lower.. A sucessful gamble will add either nudges, features or virtual cash.

This fruit machine game includes lots hidden tricks including classic "Holds", "Nudges", "Hold 3 Times" and "Holds After Nudges".

Some of feature games are win spins, Mega Hold, Win Picker, Rise and Fall, Roll'Em and the excellent Win Series.

The eature bonuses can help you win more and include extra life, extra steps, extra cash, extra features, no lose and lucky 7!

A quick game will let you play infinately just for fun! Or select a Challenge game, which will allow you to challenge your friends online with the weekly highscore board which is reset each week.

Please remember, all game wins and losses are virtual, no real money can be won or lost on this fun game.
